titles.title: It Is No Longer I That Liveth, But Christ That Liveth In Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
It's no longer I that liveth
But Christ that liveth in me,
It's no longer I that liveth
But Christ that liveth in me!
He lives! He lives! Jesus is alive in me!
It's no longer I that liveth
But Christ that liveth in me!
